TopicTitle: Waiter, theres a _____________ in my soup!

Articles.Content: Customer: There is something fishy about my Cowporken.

It's made of the Mediterranean Octopork meat.

Waiter! A cheeseckenburger, please.

Waiter: We tried Sir, but there is an angry mob of Chickens surrounding the building, that insist you have the vegetable soup.

C:W, There is a potential riot in my soup.

Yessir, the potential one. The kinetic riot is just approaching.

Waiter! There is no bread on the table, so bring me the brioche.

Waiter: Brioche contains eggs. Now we are in a heap of trouble.

Customer: Quick, dive in to the Soup Vortex and let us be away.

It's a soup pool. So, you can't be away, but let me join the party as you wish.

Salesman! A pack of dry soup pills.

Waiter: Ahh Sir, that is the delivery guy, supplying our ingredients. You can only get them rehydralised and in your bowl, just like all our other customers.

C:W, There is more in my soup than dreamt of in your philosophy.

The soup plate is either half full, or half fool, or half empty, or is full of flies.

Waiter! Bill! Is it you?

Waiter: Ahh yes the bill, coming right up Sir.

C:W, There is a summer nights dream in my soup.

A dead mosquito soup, as you wish.

Waiter! A beesquit, please.

Waiter: As you wish, but there will be no more honey from now on.

C:W,There is a reflection, of what could be in my soup, in my soup.

Here's you mirror. You dropped it into the soup plate.

Waiter! Why these wooden boards instead of normal plates? Is it a restaurant or a hut in the forest?

Waiter: Sorry, we were going through that fad of wood boards and serving chips in minature fry baskets.

C:W, There is nothing I can see in my bowl.

Because it's a bowling,not Hogwartz.

Waiter! Expecto pepperonus!

Sorry about that

Waiter there's a starship in my soup

Yes, the SpaceX fans were eating from this plate before you.

Waiter! Why do you need tips? Are you an archer?

Waiter: yes and yes, you might have noticed my eyebrow arching.

C:W, There is no hill, nor butterfly, nor pseudo human, nor corrupted wish, nor silly question, nor superpower, nor limerick, nor music quote, nor zombie attack, nor ksp2 in my soup. What am I to do?

Reading the menu. Will you finally order something?

Waiter! What are you waiting for?

Waiter: Gwen Stefani.

C: What is that in my soup?

Waiter: Deborah! Jeff Bezos got into the soup again! Get @Souptime's soup-cleanin' sweeper!

Customer: Wait! Don't do it! He'll sue you!

We know him, he's Marty. Marty Sue.

Waiter! Too late. No wait... Two late. One is just in time. Bring one.

Waiter. One ton soup coming right up.

C:W, There is a heaviness to my soup.

Waiter: The heaviness is in your heart.

Customer:Waiter, A triple bypass please.

Pass by the bar three times, please.

A straw berry eye scream, please.

Waiter: Hold still, this is going to sting.

C:W, There is mystery meat in my soup.
